abstract: Robin Pogrebin Inside Art column; Museum of the City of New York plans fall show Gay Gotham: Art and Underground Culture in New York; San Francisco Museum of Modern Art and Dallas Museum of Art jointly acquire their first sculpture by Walter De Maria; Studio Museum in Harlem will begin series of 'inHarlem initiatives' this summer to celebrate upcoming 50th anniversary; Performance Ski store in Aspen, Colo, will host mountain-themed exhibit from July to August.

headline.print_headline: The Gay Underground in All Its Invention
headline.main: The Museum of the City of New York to Examine a Gay Underground

keywords.value: Museum of the City of New York
keywords.name: organizations

keywords.value: San Francisco Museum of Modern Art
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: The Museum of the City of New York scrutinizes a subculture through the prism of 10 creators in its coming exhibition “Gay Gotham.”
lead_paragraph: The Museum of the City of New York scrutinizes a subculture through the prism of 10 creators in its coming exhibition “Gay Gotham.”
